summary: The module implements dataset classes for the protein‑protein interaction (PPI) benchmark used in inductive graph learning. It handles downloading, parsing JSON graph data, converting NetworkX graphs to DGL format, and provides indexed access to training, validation, and test graphs.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to quickly load and use the PPI dataset for training and evaluating graph neural network models in bio‑informatics and related domains, reducing data preparation effort.
